title: List Reversal Function
description:
Write a function `reverse_list` that takes a list as input and returns the same list reversed. The input list can contain any type of elements (integers, strings, lists, tuples, etc.).

#### Function Signature
```python
def reverse_list(lst: List[Any]) -> List[Any]:
```

#### Input
- `lst` (List[Any]): A list containing any type of elements.

#### Output
- Returns a new list with the same elements as `lst`, but in reversed order.
